text: -rjana#yaqstABi#rEqvainA$M pacati ShaqDBiH pa#catiq ShaDvA Ruqtava# RuqtuBi#rEqvainA$M pacatiq dviH pacaqntvityA#haq tasmAqd dviH sa#M~Mvathsaqrasya# saqsyaM pa#cyatE vAruqNyu#KA&BIddhA# maiqtriyOpai#tiq SAntyai# dEqvastvA# saviqtOd-va#paqtvityA#ha saviqtRupra#sUta EqvainAqM brahma#NA dEqvatA#Biqrud-va#paqtyapa#dyamAnA pRuthiqvyASAq diSaq A pRuqNE - [  ] 37
